survey_name: Remote Team Communication Tools Effectiveness Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of various communication tools used by remote teams to enhance collaboration and productivity.

questions.question_text: Which communication tools does your team primarily use for remote work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools. Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox. Include an 'Other' option with an open text field.

script.question_text: Which communication tools does your team primarily use for remote work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your primary communication tool?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Consider mobile-friendly radio buttons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button. Ensure the scale is displayed horizontally for desktop and vertically for mobile.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your primary communication tool?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face with your current communication tools? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an 'Other' option for additional input. Ensure clarity in options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox. Include an 'Other' option with an open text field.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face with your current communication tools? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your communication tools?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with frequency options. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button. Display options vertically for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your communication tools?

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see improved or added to your communication tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text. Set a character limit of 500.
